definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

hereditary benefits such as rank and wealth
to choose a capital by divination/to choose a home/to choose one's burial place by divination
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound/old variant of 壟|垄
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
